shows.title: Singing Peace, Salaam, Shalom, and Shanti
shows.desc:
Sing, clap, and stomp a joyful noise! Sing from Arabic to Zulu, and even in your mother tongue. Sing a new song, sing a familiar peace song… Sing into being God’s kingdom of inclusion, justice, and non-violence.

Sing Peace! are Community of Christ volunteers and friends who love making music and singing out the Good News.
